Duck DNS.description:
Free DDNS (Dynamic DNS) service: i.e. mytag.duckdns.org returns the IPv4 of your internet router's WAN IP, by default. See also port forwarding.

Note: required Duck DNS account uses OAuth via X, GitHub, or Google.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

PUID.description: Existing UID to run DuckDNS under.
PUID.label: UID [e.g. 1000]

PGID.description: Existing GID to run DuckDNS under.
PGID.label: GID [e.g. 1000]

SUBDOMAINS.description: You DuckDNS Subdomain: no spaces. Comma separated multiple entries.
SUBDOMAINS.label: Subdomain(s) [e.g. mytag]
